name: Werewolf Gardener
description:
Gardening can be relaxing, but not this time!

Press "Help" for a bit of a tutorial. Press space or p for a volume slider

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 101 Theme: Limit

Limitation : Control the Environment

All assets made by me except the font:

Alkhemikal https://www.dafont.com/alkhemikal.font?l[]=10
